CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , successful examples of random terpolymers with broad light absorption and high efficiency are limited.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| random terpolymers |
| light |
| high efficiency |

Note: I included "light" as a material here because in some contexts it can be considered a material (e.g., light as a particle in physics). However, if we are only considering "material" in the sense of a solid or liquid substance, then "light" would not be a valid material name. I also included "high efficiency" as a material name because it is mentioned in the context of the efficiency of the random terpolymers, but it is not a material in the traditional sense.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| random terpolymers |

Note: I have removed "light" and "high efficiency" from the list of material names because they do not clearly refer to a material in the traditional sense. "Random terpolymers" is the only clear material name in the paragraph.
